name: get_litecoin_block_by_hash_or_height
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool litecoin_wallet.
Tool description: litecoin blockchain wallet that support creating wallets & addresses, sending and receiving Litecoins and many more!
API description: Fetches detailed information about a Litecoin block by its hash or height.

hash.description: The hash or height of the Litecoin block you want to retrieve details for.
